about_the_game:
What’s Included in This Product

This version of TicToc Guardians includes:

  • 8 unique stages, each designed to challenge players with puzzle-platforming mechanics.

  • All three playable characters (Rabbit, Cat, Beaver) with distinct abilities.

  • Full single-player experience with time-based puzzle-solving mechanics.

  • Classic cartoon-style 3D graphics inspired by Western animation.

  • This version does not include additional post-launch content or expansions planned for future updates.

Game Overview

Game Name:
TicToc Guardians

Genre:
3D Puzzle Platformer

Playtime:
Approximately 2–3 minutes per stage

Number of Stages:
8 stages in total

Graphic Style:
Western classic cartoon style

Synopsis

Welcome to Toki City, a paradise for land animals!
An unexpected disaster has struck—Dr. Turtle, the villain, has created dimensional rifts to flood the entire city. The only ones who can stop this catastrophe are... you, the commander of the TicToc Guardians!

Gameplay Objectives and Player Role

Gameplay Objectives:
The main goal of the game is to guide three animal agents to repair the dimensional rifts appearing across Toki City. Players must strategically utilize each character’s unique speed, jump height, and special abilities to successfully navigate through the levels and accomplish the mission.

Player Role:
As the commander of the TicToc Guardians team, you will explore maps, determine the sequence of actions for each animal agent, and directly control them in order to repair the rifts. The order in which you control the characters can affect the timeline’s causality, requiring players to carefully plan and execute their strategies.

Character Abilities

  • Rabbit: Known for its fast movement speed, the Rabbit is perfect for quickly navigating through levels.

  • Cat: With its high jump capability, the Cat excels at reaching elevated areas.

  • Beaver: Specializes in creating and pushing boxes, allowing the team to overcome large gaps and obstacles.

Controls

  • Movement: WASD

  • Jump: Spacebar

  • UI Interaction: Mouse Click

  • Return to Character Selection: 1

  • Restart Level: R

  • Skip Remaining Time: X

  • Beaver Special Ability (Create Box): B

name: TicToc Guardians

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64bit)
  • Processor: i5-3570 3.4 GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: realtek

  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: TBD(To Be Determined)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: realtek

short_description: '틱톡 가디언즈'는 한 명의 플레이어가 세 명의 캐릭터를 “동시”에 조작하는 협동 플레이의 재미를 혼자서도 경험할 수 있는 게임입니다.
